Package student

Class Student

  • java.lang.Object
    • student.Student
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    NonResident, Resident
    public class Student
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is the superclass Student and contains the profile and the credit hours that the student is taking. It is extended by NonResident and Resident.
    Author:
    Stephen Juan, David Halim

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private int creditHours  
      static int fulltimeThreshold  
      private java.lang.String lastPaymentDate  
      static int minFulltime  
      private Profile profile  
      private float totalPayment  
      private float tuitionDue  
      static int universityFee  

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Student()
      This is a default constructor that sets the a default profile with name 'Default Name' and a default major of CS and zero credit hours.
      Student​(Profile profile)
      This is a constructor with only the profile of the student as a parameter.
      Student​(Profile profile, int creditHours)
      This is an overloaded constructor that initializes the profile and the number of credit the student is taking.

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      boolean equals​(java.lang.Object obj)
      This method returns true if both student profiles are equal, false if not.
      int getCreditHours()
      This method returns the number of credits the student is taking.
      java.lang.String getLastPaymentDate()
      This method returns the date of last payment.
      Profile getProfile()
      This method returns the profile of the student.
      float getTotalPayment()
      This method returns the total payment that the student has made.
      float getTuitionDue()
      This method returns the tuition due.
      void isValidCreditHours()
      Checks the validity of credit hours (between 3 and 24 inclusive).
      void resetPaymentandDate()
      This method is for the international class for study abroad, sets payment to zero and clears payment date
      void setCreditStudAbroad()
      This method is for the international class for study abroad.
      void setLastPaymentDateAmount​(Date input, float payment)
      This method is a method that is called when anything is being paid.
      void setTuitionDue​(float amount)
      This method sets the remaining tuition due to the parameter that it takes in.
      java.lang.String toString()
      This method returns a string representation of the student in the format "name:major:".
      void tuitionDue()
      This is do-nothing method that is to be overloaded in the classes that extend the student class.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Student

        public Student()
        throws java.lang.Exception
        This is a default constructor that sets the a default profile with name 'Default Name' and a default major of CS and zero credit hours. It calls the overloaded constructor to pass on the values.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if the credit hours are invalid.

      • Student

        public Student​(Profile profile,
               int creditHours)
        throws java.lang.Exception
        This is an overloaded constructor that initializes the profile and the number of credit the student is taking.
        Parameters:
        profile - - profile (including name and major) of the student
        creditHours - - number of credits the student is taking
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if the credit hours are invalid.

      • Student

        public Student​(Profile profile)
        throws java.lang.Exception
        This is a constructor with only the profile of the student as a parameter.
        Parameters:
        profile - - profile of the student
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if the credit hours are invalid.

    • Method Detail

      • setLastPaymentDateAmount

        public void setLastPaymentDateAmount​(Date input,
                                     float payment)
        This method is a method that is called when anything is being paid. It adds the total payment to the last payment amount and saves the last payment date.
        Parameters:
        input - - the date object
        payment - - last payment amount

      • getTotalPayment

        public float getTotalPayment()
        This method returns the total payment that the student has made.
        Returns:
        total payment the student made

      • setTuitionDue

        public void setTuitionDue​(float amount)
        This method sets the remaining tuition due to the parameter that it takes in. It is called once in every one of the subclasses.
        Parameters:
        amount - - amount of money that is due

      • setCreditStudAbroad

        public void setCreditStudAbroad()
        This method is for the international class for study abroad. If they have more than 12 credits, then the credit amount is set to 12.

      • resetPaymentandDate

        public void resetPaymentandDate()
        This method is for the international class for study abroad, sets payment to zero and clears payment date

      • getTuitionDue

        public float getTuitionDue()
        This method returns the tuition due. It is used in JUnit Test classes.
        Returns:
        the tuition due

      • tuitionDue

        public void tuitionDue()
        This is do-nothing method that is to be overloaded in the classes that extend the student class.

      • getCreditHours

        public int getCreditHours()
        This method returns the number of credits the student is taking.
        Returns:
        number of credits the student is taking

      • getLastPaymentDate

        public java.lang.String getLastPaymentDate()
        This method returns the date of last payment.
        Returns:
        date of last payment

      • getProfile

        public Profile getProfile()
        This method returns the profile of the student. It's used in the compare method of Profile.
        Returns:
        profile of the student.

      • isValidCreditHours

        public void isValidCreditHours()
                        throws java.lang.Exception
        Checks the validity of credit hours (between 3 and 24 inclusive).
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if the credit hours are invalid.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        This method returns a string representation of the student in the format "name:major:".
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        string representation of a student as "name:major:credit hours"

      • equals

        public boolean equals​(java.lang.Object obj)
        This method returns true if both student profiles are equal, false if not.
        Overrides:
        equals in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        true, if both students are the same, false if otherwise
